notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
taskDescription:
Propose a structure for compound C, which has M+ = 86 in its mass spectrum, an IR absorption at 3400 cm–1, and the following 13C NMR spectral data:

Compound C

  • Broadband-decoupled 13C NMR: 30.2, 31.9, 61.8, 114.7, 138.4 δ
  • DEPT-90: 138.4 δ
  • DEPT-135: positive peak at 138.4 δ; negative peaks at 30.2, 31.9, 61.8, 114.7 δ
